channel.title: [help] Easy for you, hard for me :( [help]
channel.description:
Alright, i got to the router and opened the ports, i've downloaded a server (pimpscape) and a server source builder (the 4.0 from mod taharok) i go through the steps from the server source builder, and after that, i added the code's:
[b]Compiler code:[/b]
[i]@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/i]
[b]Runserver code:[/b]
[i]@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/i]
After that, i've pressed on the runserver file, and then it say's: ''starting special edition PimpScape BETA [c] killamess, server on 0.0.0.0:43594'' (nothing happens...)
then i tryed to press on the runserver file (the programm say's it again) but i let it running, and tryed to make a server on the moparscape server list. It say's: ''the server ****** is offline, we only set up online servers'' (it doesn't work)
i believe you must set the no-ip address in the runserver on someway, so it says: ''starting special edition PimpScape BETA [c] killamess, server on *.*.*.*:43594'' (the * is in this case, my IP address)
But the question is, how do i install my IP in the runserver??
I hope you can answer my question.

the TuT is for that router its in 1 of the sectins and sorry i duno how to prrtforward for no-ip, i dont have a router see so i dont have 2

item.description:
@golddealer wrote:

Where do u can login?? Through what?? what do u mean with edit and login through hamchi or no-ip?? Plz explain, i’m just a noob, write in noob language… I dont understand this, explain simply.

Very ty if you can do this for me.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 12:45:58 PM[/size][hr]OEPS!!! now i know how… But only my hamachi IP is doing it :S, how u portforward with a motorola broadcom router???

Hope you could help

ok when u run teh server it says starting when it realy has acctualy started allready… u can edit what it says, u can eathr use hamachi or no-ip, but if u just want to edit uu can use the ip of 0.0.0.0 and any name and pass aslong as your server is running, when u log in thats when something happens in the run server.bat

item.source: [help] Easy for you, hard for me :( [help]

item.title: [help] Easy for you, hard for me :( [help]
item.dc:creator: @golddealer golddealer
item.description:
@golddealer wrote:

Alright, i got to the router and opened the ports, i’ve downloaded a server (pimpscape) and a server source builder (the 4.0 from mod taharok) i go through the steps from the server source builder, and after that, i added the code’s:

Compiler code:

@echo off
title Compiler
“%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Runserver code:

@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

After that, i’ve pressed on the runserver file, and then it say’s: ‘‘starting special edition PimpScape BETA [c] killamess, server on 0.0.0.0:43594’’
(nothing happens…)

then i tryed to press on the runserver file (the programm say’s it again) but i let it running, and tryed to make a server on the moparscape server list. It say’s: ‘‘the server ****** is offline, we only set up online servers’’
(it doesn’t work)

i believe you must set the no-ip address in the runserver on someway, so it says: ‘‘starting special edition PimpScape BETA [c] killamess, server on ...:43594’’ (the * is in this case, my IP address)

But the question is, how do i install my IP in the runserver??

I hope you can answer my question.

Read full topic
item.source: [help] Easy for you, hard for me :( [help]
